article.title: Northrop Grumman Awarded U.S. Navy JCREW 3.3 Development Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Navy has awarded Northrop Grumman a $28 million contract to continue development of the Joint Counter Radio-Controlled Improvised Explosive Device (RCIED) Electronic Warfare (JCREW) 3.3 system of systems. JCREW is a multifunctional electronic jammer that can be carried by troops, mounted on a vehicle or boat, or used in a fixed location to prevent the detonation of RCIEDs.
